DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect ketone production dietary MCT supplement combine physical exercise two group woman ( N=10/group ) , healthy adult patient prediabetes . After evaluation metabolism ( 4-hour visit multiple blood sample ) begin study , participant take one-week MCT supplement alone follow one-week period take MCT supplement combination physical exercise . At end period time , 4-hour visit evaluation metabolism repeat .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Exercise Ketone Production Women With Without Prediabetes
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman group : fasting blood glucose < 6.1 mmol/L HbA1c < 6.0 % . Women prediabetes : fasting blood glucose 6.1 6.9 mmol/L HbA1c 6.0 6.4 % Structured physical activity ( 2 time per week ) Inability practice physical exercise Diabetes ( fast glucose ≥ 7.0mmol/L HbA1c ≥ 6.5 % ) Uncontrolled dyslipidemia hypertension Use medication know affect metabolism lipid carbohydrate ( steroid , betablockers , diuretic , insulin sensitizer , etc . ) Severe infection inflammation
